name: Marble Master
summary: Master all four exciting modes of play: Single Player - Mission and Sudden Death, Competitive and Arcade Mode. Plus an in-depth tutorial mode that will help you become a Marble Master! Marbles with Attitude - Over 25 different kinds, Jokers, Bombs, Crushers, Color Zappers and more, each with a special Power. Infinite Gameplay! Endless hours of challenging fun. Balance is Key! Innovative scale feature adds a new puzzle challenge.
